We will take care of the injured. We will mourn those lost with all our collective love & support. We will bind up this new national wound.
We will have to reckon with the fact that this man was able to assemble an arsenal of military-grade weapons.
Some of the questions we have today won‚Äôt have clear answers; others are perhaps beyond our fathoming. But some will have answers.
What led a man to commit such violence upon his fellow human beings, complete strangers? What twisted reasoning? What madness?
What was this person‚Äôs perverted motive? Was there any history of mental health issues?
How did this monster acquire the arsenal he used to rain down death on a crowd of innocents?  Were those guns purchased & compiled legally?
Today, we are filled with shock and horror, sadness and rage. And we are left with more questions than answers.
